instructions.main_head_002: Choose the correct letter A, B or C.

questions.text:
Choose the correct letter A, B or C.
21. What gives Tim the idea for his dissertation proposal?
options: A his grandmother asked him to record her language
B he heard about a linguistic project he wanted to join
C he learned about conserving languages on his course
questions.correct_answer: C he learned about conserving languages on his course

questions.text: 22. When talking about the impact of technology, Tim
options: A points out a problem caused by its spread
B explains how it can be used to conserve language
C emphasizes its importance for communication
questions.correct_answer: A points out a problem caused by its spread

questions.text: 23. Tim and his tutor decide that in the introduction to his dissertation he should discuss
options: A the impact of media on language
B how globalization has helped remote communities
C the reasons why he talks to his grandmother in English
questions.correct_answer: A the impact of media on language

questions.text: 24. What does Tim say about documenting dying languages?
options: A he believes writing a language down stops it from falling out of use
B he sees little point in trying to revive languages that are already dead
C he is unconvinced that his grandmother’s language can be saved
questions.correct_answer: C he is unconvinced that his grandmother’s language can be saved

questions.text: 25. Tim’s tutor explains to him that recording minority languages is
options: A something that schoolchildren can be involved in
B a way to allow future generations to experience them
C a useful tool for training language teachers
questions.correct_answer: B a way to allow future generations to experience them

questions.text: 26. When talking about language and culture Tim
options: A highlights why family traditions are important to him
B describes how the two subjects are linked together
C expresses a desire to learn about his family’s customs
questions.correct_answer: A highlights why family traditions are important to him

questions.text:
